current.footer_column_signup_header: Sign up for news, offers, recipes and more!
current.product_warranty_default: Our motor is covered by a 10 year warranty. The remaining parts are covered by a 2 year warranty.
current.product_warranty_1_year: Our motor and parts are covered by a 1 year warranty.
current.promo_banner_content: Save up to $209 on Slow Juicers and enjoy FREE shipping! Sale ends on 1/30.
current.page_hero_lead: Hurom has partnered with Giugiaro Design to create a unique and innovative collection of new juicers, the Giugiaro series. The new H-AE and H-AF are engineered to merge the concepts of superior design and nutritional capability, raising the bar on user-friendly ergonomics.

settings.title: Versatility
settings.body: What do you love in your juice? Do you like sweet fruits like apples and oranges? Or dark leafy greens like kale and spinach? How about cashews or almonds for a nutty taste? With a Hurom juicer, you can confidently pick and choose from a wide range of ingredients.

settings.title: Designed for You
settings.block_1_label: Our quiet motor lets you start off the morning without causing a stir and cleaning up takes just a couple minutes.
settings.block_2_label: Hurom juicers are 100% BPA free and come without any blades or sharp parts, making it safe for your entire family.
settings.block_3_label: Juicing yields more juice from the ingredients for great tasting juice that lasts up to 72 hours.
settings.block_4_label: The juicing coneâs natural motion minimizes damage to ingredients, keeping natural taste and nutrition intact.

settings.title: The Slow Squeeze Difference
settings.body: Hurom juicers are designed to minimize the breakdown and oxidation of fruits and vegetables. This means your juice will contain more nutrients and a fresh, natural taste.
settings.hurom_featured_alt: Tomato juice made by Hurom slow juicer
settings.hurom_body: In this microscopic close up of Hurom-made tomato juice, you can see how the juice retains its natural color and cellular structure.
settings.others_featured_alt: Tomato juice made by centrifugal juicers or blenders
settings.others_body: Centrifugal juicers and blenders heat up and oxidize the tomato juice with high speed blades, reducing nutrients and breaking down the form and color.

settings.block_1_desc: All Certified Refurbished machines have been built and refurbished by hand.
settings.block_2_desc: 15-Day Money Back Guarantee with pre-paid return labels.
settings.block_3_desc: Free shipping is available for every Certified Refurbished purchase.
settings.block_4_desc: Learn more about the 5-year warranty and No Risk Guarantee on every Certified Refurbished Juicer.

settings.technology:
Alpha Technology
- Latest generation of the patented Hurom Slow Squeeze technology.
settings.juicing_versatility: Leafy Greens, Wheatgrass, Hard Produce, Soft Produce, Nuts & Beans, Sorbets & Ice Cream, Baby Food
settings.accessories: Drying Rack, Tofu Press, Ice Cream Strainer, Citrus Squeezer Attachment, Recipe Book

settings.technology:
2nd Generation
- Previous generation of the patented Hurom Slow Squeeze technology.
settings.juicing_versatility: Leafy Greens, Wheatgrass, Hard Produce, Soft Produce, Nuts & Beans, Baby Food

settings.text: Find the perfect juice recipe for you!

settings.title: New Year Sale: Up to 30% Off Slow Juicers
settings.shop_link_text: Hurom H200 Easy Clean Slow Juicer

settings.text: This high-tech juicer makes creating your favorite beverages easier than ever.
It out-performed all the others we tested. Youâll be hard âpressedâ to find a more stylish option.
Overall we were impressed by the style, power, and versatility of the Hurom. Almonds went through like a dream.

settings.text_1: Including our classic bestsellers and old favorites. These juicers have won multiple design awards.
settings.text_2: The Hurom Citrus Juicer is perfect for your simpler juicing needs, whether itâs juicing large oranges for a breakfast OJ or small limes for your seltzer water.

settings.title: Our Mission
settings.text: We support healthier lifestyles for our customers by helping them effectively integrate nutritious, whole foods into their diet.
âA life-changing appliance. Iâve had the juicer for one week and have transformed my way of eating.â
settings.author: Elise F. (verified buyer, H-AA Slow Juicer)

settings.text: âDon't waste your money on other juicers...I've had them all and this one is the best. Just what the doctor ordered.â
settings.author: Elmir M. (verified buyer, HP Slow Juicer)

settings.text: âThis juice is pretty incredible. The juice doesnât separate even after 24-48 hours (clear vs color) like the juice I used to buy at a juice place.â
settings.author: Allison B. (verified buyer, H-AI Slow juicer)

settings.question: [name], what health benefits do you want from juicing?

settings.question: What do you like to juice

settings.question: On average, how much time do you want to spend on each recipe, including prep work and cleaning?

settings.title: Select Your Product
settings.description: If you already know which model you have, select your model from the dropdown below. You can find your model number on the label sticker underneath your Hurom product.
